storyInfo: Flametail and Ashlock head for border city Dzwonek and find the Infected currently being provoked there. The only one willing to talk to them is saddled with a criminal charge, and when they meet Młynar along the way, they implore him to lend a helping hand.

attributes.content: To Młynar Nearl,
I haven't heard back in some time. It may be you're too busy with life in Kawalerielki to exchange letters with an old friend. I respect your choice, and I hope all is going well for you.
I've heard many anecdotes from the knightclub. Should we have another opportunity to convene, I'd be happy to tell you in person. My affairs are still a far cry from my ideal, but I've no regrets.
I only intend to waste so much ink on civilities. Let me be candid. I write to you for this reason:
Celina has been arrested, and sent to the Grand Knight Territory.
She is the most devout, refined knight I have ever met, a companion-in-arms, and my true love. I needn't say more.
You must remember her. Red of hair and signal flare, laughter that could smooth any furrowed brow.
So many a time she has led us out alive from places of death. I could never accept her being the first to leave us.
I swear on my knight's honor that Celina is innocent. Indeed it is her upstanding nature that has so bristled the murky-hearted politicians and merchants.
It is not right that a knight like her be a sacrifice to the petty stunts of such authorities.

Were we facing a foreign foe, be they the Shieldguards of Ursus or the Künsteritter of Leithanien, I'd be charging headlong at their ranks. Fighting until my armor is shattered, and my lance is in twain.
But against the National Council, against the General Chamber of Commerce, I am powerless.
Młynar, it pains me greatly to disturb your life of peace. Still, I have tried all else, and now I can only beg your help.
I beseech you. While I cannot do this myself, pass on this evidence in my place, and thereby clear her name.
For you are my friend, and you are a Nearl.
This is no lovesick entreaty, Młynar. That is not why I beg.
I simply ask that one worthy knight save another.
Sincerely, your old friend Czcibor
The letter had been opened and placed back inside its envelope.
It sat in a sea of so many other papers, stowed away in a jumbled drawer.
We interrupt with breaking news from the city.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: Zeno Shelvin, ringleader of multiple Infected incidents, including the riot that took place days ago in the new district as well as the assault and clash with guards at the city entrance, has given himself up today.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: The suspect was a worker recruited from Gale Industries' 'Infected Help-Up Program.' He claims to have long been dissatisfied with his life, which led to him planning the recent riots...
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: Gale Industries, the firm in charge of principal construction of the new district, stated they would work as fast as humanly possible to repair any damage to the buildings, alongside making reparations to residents.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: In addition, they plan to tighten up security administration and put an end to any similar incidents.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: We remind all residents that you are urged to take proper safety measures in the event you need to leave the city.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: We would like everyone to remain calm...
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: Giving Infected work, my ass. It's just trouble for normal folk in the end.
attributes.name: Onlooking Passersby

attributes.content: Wouldn't they all be wild gloompincer chow by now if Gale never gave them a chance? He's got some nerve being 'dissatisfied' with life!
attributes.name: Onlooking Passersby

attributes.content: Never should've let them in in the first place. Not one good thing about the Infected.
attributes.name: Onlooking Passersby

attributes.content: But now they're here, and they try and bring all their friends in too. Look at the recent news! They don't even give two shits about the guards!
attributes.name: Onlooking Passersby

attributes.content: News says he turned himself in.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...He wouldn't do that.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: I don't wanna believe it either, but what gives?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Two days ago
November 27th, 2:00 P.M.
New District, Dzwonek, construction area
Dead-end ahead!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Could probably... pile more against this door...
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: It's a swarm of people out there. I can't hold for too long...
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: I still don't get it. Why are they attacking us? Did I say something wrong just now?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: No... they didn't even give you a chance to. It's more like they're indiscriminately lashing out...
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: If I remember right, and I'm pretty sure I do, the task we got was to 'make contact with all the Infected orgs forming along the Kazimierz border towns,' not 'pacify local Infected mobs.'
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: I'm guessing our intel's a little old.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: This is our first real, formal mission since we hit Rhodes Island. Do they always handle problems this tricky?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: It was bound to be more complex, compared to taking down single opponents in the arena.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: What now? Think we should fight our way out if we gotta?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Rhodes Island employee regulations say our first priority when facing sudden conflict with Infected in the field is to maintain basic self-control...
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Well, this sure as heck isn't the time to start reciting the handbook!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: You two! This way, come with me!
...This should be far enough. Most people won't know about this passage—it's not fully built yet.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: Phew... tha... thanks.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Can I ask, why did you—
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: You're Ashlock Knight and Flametail Knight, right?!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Wha?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Ashlock Knight! I'm a diehard fan of yours! I've seen every single match you're in!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: Wait, you have the cannon! That's the one you had when you beat Brassrust!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: I still remember how that went. You spared 'Brassrust' Ingra right at the end, and then fired a shot into the air, right?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: That was so so so cool! It looks just like on TV—no, wait, it looks a little bigger, even, when you see the real thing. Ca—Can I touch it?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: Wow, Ashley, figures we'd still find fans of yours this far out from the GKT!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Oh yeah! I'm super into you too, Flametail Knight!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: Hahaha... you don't gotta give me special treatment. I'm not the jealous type.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: So... can I ask who you are?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry, I got too excited. Forgot to introduce myself.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: I'm Zeno, one of the Infected here to work in Dzwonek. I guess I am a foreman, to be exact...
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Infected

attributes.content: We heard there were Infected in Dzwonek setting up a mutual aid group. Are you part of it too?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: How I should put this... Well, you see, the Infected here weren't originally allowed to live in the cities.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Gale Industries started constructing a new sector here some time ago, and they needed a lot of hands on deck for that, so they hired a few Infected and brought them in to work.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: At first, everyone felt like they'd gotten a once in a lifetime chance for some honest work.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: But gradually, you heard more and more complaining. A lot of people got the sense they were paying us way too little compared to regular folk.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: It's not like we were ever going to get as much as they do, but some things are worth trying. Just like how the Blood Knight fought for a new path for Infected.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: So, I was really in support of us organizing to protest against Gale Industries.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: But after that... well, you've seen what it's like outside.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: So, the rioting, the raids... that was all Infected hired by Gale?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: No, not anymore, not all of them. I've got no idea where all those people came from...
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: I don't even know... how they can think of so many ways to commit violence.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: ...We're getting nowhere like this. It's only going to make the situation worse and worse for Infected.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Ashley, from the sound of it, do you think someone deliberately went and lit the fuse?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Hey, it's almost over, though. Just watch out for a few days and you two'll be fine.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: (...'Almost over'?)
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, what are you two doing in Dzwonek? Sightseeing? Maybe an exhibition match?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Actually, we're not even competition knights anymore.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Now we're partnered up with a drug company dedicated to curing Oripathy. Our work's different, but our ideal of helping more Infected sure isn't changing any time soon!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: And we're here precisely to bone up on what living conditions are like for the Infected in these parts.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Though, y'know, the situation sure is a little more than we bargained for...
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: If you're a knight sports fan, then I'm afraid what we're here to do is going to disappoint you.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Excuse me? Who cares about those fancypants money-knights with their sponsored gear and their dumb show-fights?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: I love the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub! I love when you guys make those nobles remember the taste of dirt, and channel the fury of all us Infected!
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: But since they already know our might thanks to you guys, it's not like you've got to stick to arena bloodsports forever.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: The fact you get to help the Infected even more now is like... I'm more happy for you than it's even possible to be in a single moment.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: If you really do have a medical organization working to treat Infected, then that's just... that's just... man! How do I even imagine it?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Anyway, can I just, I know it's a little awkward, but like I'll ever get this chance again... Ashlock Knight, can I get your autograph?!
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: O... Of course! J-J-Just hold on a moment. Uh... sorry, I don't think I've got a pen or paper on me right now.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Oh, but I do have a signature from the Radiant Knight with me. And I may as well give it to you; you'd probably appreciate it more.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: It's okay, I've got more chances to meet her in future—
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: You're so kind, thank you, but, um, if it's okay, I'd actually prefer your signature.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Huh...? Why?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight's really great and all, strong and upstanding and everything...
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: But for us regular Infected, seeing knights like you standing in the arena is even more of an inspiration.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Sona, lend me your sword for a sec.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Sure, but what are you gonna do—
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: —Carve your name on a helmet? Jeez, leave it to you, Ashley!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: It's not too good an autograph, but I'd say you can make it out... Take this, if you don't mind it.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: (Gaze of disbelief)
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Thank you so so so much... but this is just too precious of a gift. I can't accept this!
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: It's okay! I'm over the moons just getting to meet you two today.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: And sorry, but I've got some work I need to do now. I've got just one request. If possible, could neither of you tell anyone you saw me?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Wait—
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: I've got to go. I hope we can meet again!
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: He was right there with us when the riot broke out. There's no way he took part in it. But...
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: You're kind of worried too, right? What if Zeno really was the guy who set it all up?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: The big corps have always had an iron grip on what the news reports. They could suppress a single person's voice without lifting a finger... There's too much suspicious about this.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: But on the other hand, I feel like I can't really say anything's off the table for an Infected, no matter how extreme. I mean, after you've gone through so much...
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: I just... don't want this to be the sort of person he is.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Mm... my intuition's telling me the same thing. This isn't the kinda thing he would do.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Well, if we care this much, then forget Rhodes employee regulations for now. Let's get to the bottom of this, Pinus Sylvestris-style!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: We just need to pick up the pace a little, and we won't get caught. I bet the Doctor would understand!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...And? How do we do this?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Suppose Zeno is the prime suspect in this whole outlash. How'd they be dealing with him right about now?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: With an incident of this level, they'd probably ship him off to the Grand Knight Territory for the National Council to handle.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: So, if Zeno hasn't been sent to the GKT, and he's hiding somewhere else, doesn't that mean something else brought on this whole shebang?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: I mean, obviously, Dzwonek is smaller than Kawalerielki, but it's still going to be hard finding someone who doesn't want to be found.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Not necessarily. Let's do it just like we used to. First we test the waters... If what Toland said before is still valid, then maybe we can find a bounty hunter and start our inquiries there.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: And then—
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Sona?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: ...No, I think my eyes just went funny. Felt like I recognized someone just now.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: —Y'know what, let's get a move-on!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Built to stand testament to Kazimierz and Leithanien's friendly diplomatic ties, the 'Voice of the Knights' is now nearing completion. The cutting of the ribbon is anticipated to take place on the 1st of December.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: Count Dierolf, representative of the visiting Leithanian delegation, will be personally attending, and is expected to give a speech.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: Sadly, the Leithanian-born celebrity knight, 'The Candle Knight' Viviana, is unable to attend the ceremony.
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: However, she will be giving her blessings to the friendship between the two nations through an external connection...
attributes.name: TV Broadcast

attributes.content: You're quite transfixed by this statue, aren't you?
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: Pardon...?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Sorry to accost you so suddenly; I'm just a tourist here on my travels. Seeing you stood before this statue for so long, I couldn't help but try and strike up a conversation.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: Personally, I greatly admire this work of art. Its creator is one of Leithanien's most distinguished sculptors.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: The shield transfiguring into a music staff, while the gunblade and wand form notes—a beautiful message imparted through an exquisite design. What are your thoughts?
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: So a knight's arms and armor can do more than be consumed as ornaments, they can serve as instruments to sing ode to a brief peace. What relentlessly convenient things.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You seem to opine that it's not for a knight's sword and shield to perform such mild, elegant passages.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: They can't even give voice, let alone sing.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: And yet, better peace and cultural exchange than war and hostilities, correct?
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: If only people could see the cost and the value of our current peace.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If you'd let me be so bold once more, were you perhaps once military? No, I suppose in Kazimierz parlance, you would be—a campaign knight?
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: ...Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Leithanians have a special regard for this city.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: Dzwonek, 'the Caravan Bells' Terminus.' Kazimierz's fortress upon the southern frontier.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: Even after so many years of peace, the bones of sentry towers and turrets lie hidden in its corners.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: But even back then... even at the height of Leithanien's arrogance, when its war ambitions were most tumultuous, its military has never attempted to outright take this strategic town.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: The spire casters' elite were forced to infiltrate through roundabout means, and that expedition left no survivors.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: —That was thirty years ago, perhaps even longer. Most today would never even touch upon its scars.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: —So I'm very curious as to your view.
attributes.name: Resplendently Dressed Noble

attributes.content: Mine?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...If every tourist here is as prudent as you, then I fear Dzwonek city hall will need to redouble its efforts to put up this facade.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: But you're wrong.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Like you, I'm also a mere passing tourist.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: And as for my thoughts... they went and placed it in Kazimierz. As if the sheer comedy of it wasn't biting enough.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Flametail Knight? Ashlock Knight? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: So we did guess right!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: You've got a bunch of plain-clothed goons standing around guarding an out-of-the-way building with no roof on it yet, in the middle of a Gale Industries construction district. A little too obvious, don't you think?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: But hey, you need more than a few goons to stop us!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: It's dangerous as hell here... Whoever you saw along the way, that was only a tiny fraction of the guards.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: A giant group of them could be here any moment! Get out of here, quick!
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: We're here to take you with us!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: I don't know what kinda tricks Gale Industries is up to, but if they really want to catch whoever started the riots, they're gonna have to do it by the book.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: We're not gonna sit on our asses and let them play judge, jury, and executioner.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: You didn't incite that riot, did you?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Ashlock, Flametail... I'm really grateful you'd go so far for someone you've only met once.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: But I can't go.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Why not?!
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Shh... Ashley, footsteps.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...Whatever the case, we're getting ourselves out from under their thumbs first. Follow us, Zeno.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: We know full well how cities make Infected disappear. You can't remain in their hands.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: This is probably just the beginning.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: I truly do respect you two, and I'm more grateful than you know for everything you do for the Infected.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: But I'm sorry. All my life I could never become a knight like you have, fighting in the spotlight for the Infected.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: The most my life is worth is making my family's lives a bit better...
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Can you get to the point—
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Ashley, time's up!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...Mark my words, we'll meet again.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Phew. Anyone still following? ...Should be in the clear for now.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Sorry. I got a little rash just now.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: I don't blame you or anything, just calm down a little. Before anything else, we need to take this from the top.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: —Who's there?!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Flametail's sword comes quick as a flash. The instant she hears a footstep, she thrusts her rapier behind her like a shooting star, but it fails to make it far.
Its blade is firmly in the grasp of a gauntlet-wreathed hand, rendering her unable to even pull it back.
Until the figure in the shadows lets it go.
...So this is the sort of 'knight' that farce of the arena nurtures?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Drawing your blade with no forethought is tantamount to throwing your life away.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Hahaha... I guess my eyes weren't playing tricks on me, back near the plaza.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: I recognize you. You're the head of the Nearls. The Radiant Knight's uncle, right?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Never got to talk to you back in Kawalerielki, but we heard from the Rhodes Island people how you did your part to protect the Infected back then. We really appreciate that!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...I hardly did a thing.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I also heard from the Radiant Knight how your swordsmanship's totally on par with hers, but you only ever go at 'em when you're angry, so I guess we don't get to ask if you can give us some pointers...
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...'Pinus Sylvestris.'
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Mm... hmm?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Why are you in an under-construction district?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Oh, we came on commission from Rhodes Island. We're aiding the Infected here.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: After all, that's pretty much why we founded the knightclub too.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: We thought it'd be a cinch at first, actually.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...But we only found out once we got here that things were a little... tanglier than we believed.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: And that's the rundown.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...Gale Industries?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You know 'em too?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Only from a few scant exchanges. They're nothing special.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Haha, from the angle of pushing Infected around, yeah, they're nothing special at all.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, so why are you here?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...Just to see what was happening in this city.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Ohh, don't tell me you're here about the Infected riots too? Could you help us out with this one, then?
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: I never said—
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: No, I get what you're worried about. We're not planning to butt heads with Gale's army of rent-a-cops.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Our goal might be to rescue Mr. Zeno, but now that it's reached this point, his hidden motive for refusing to escape might just be the key to this whole Infected riot conundrum.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...At least, I hope so! Out of all the Infected here, he's the one most willing to link up with us, after all.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...I never said that I supported the Infected.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: But even if this had nothing to do with the Infected, it's still a blatant false charge.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: We can't let more innocents become sacrifices to the cheap stunts of the politicians and tycoons!
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Młynar suddenly turns to look behind him.

The Pinus Sylvestris knights follow his gaze, but the end of the alley is empty. The only thing to be seen is the decorative dome of a faraway skyscraper, its neon lights twinkling a romantic wine-red in the dark of night.
It hits Flametail that she doesn't know what this Nearl is here to do. He isn't even armed—but if he needs it, she'd totally be willing to lend him her own sword.
There will always be more sacrifices... You and I might already be ones.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...I'll go confirm a few matters. Then, 'Pinus Sylvestris,' I have some questions I'll need to ask you.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You two...
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: I told you we'd meet again.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: I'm sorry... no, thank you...
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: You're thanking the wrong folks this time. Mr. Młynar here's the one who talked Gale Industries into dropping all charges against you.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Thank you... Er, wh-which company are you from? Or are you a lord noble?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: ...No, I'm merely an average office worker.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I simply happened to cross paths with someone from Gale recently, and heard talk of the direction they were taking their business.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: (Huh... Who knew the Nearls had a guy with this sorta talent too?)
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: But I can't make heads or tails of it. How is an ordinary Infected like me possibly worth all this effort?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: In the face of justice, worth doesn't even come into it.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: As long as it's in our power, we'll stride forth to meet any unrighteousness! That's Pinus Sylvestris's creed!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Since when?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Since just now!
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: ...Alright. True enough.
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Zeno, what did you mean by 'using yourself to give your family better lives'? And before that, why did you want us to pretend we'd never seen you?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Did Gale Industries threaten you into taking all the blame for the riot?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: I can't tell you...
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Mr. Młynar just talked over your circumstances with Gale. That means they don't plan to give you any more trouble. No need to worry.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: O-Okay then...
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: You guessed right. Gale Industries was under pressure from all sides with the recent Infected riot, and they had to come up with an explanation that'd satisfy everyone. And my family really needed the reward they were offering.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: As for why they weren't willing to give the workers a proper investigation, I've got as little clue as you do.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: ...If I remember right, Gale's got a subsidiary in the Oripathy protective gear business.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Though after joining Rhodes Island, seeing their ads again is honestly just kind of hilarious.
attributes.name: Flametail

attributes.content: Who discussed all this with you? Would you still be able to pick them out?
attributes.name: Ashlock

attributes.content: Actually, it was a campaign knight who came to me.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: What did you say?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You, come with me.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: O-Okay... Where are you taking me...?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Somewhere you'll be safe.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...Yes, our application to allot a team to enter Dzwonek and aid with local law enforcement has been approved.
attributes.name: Kazimierzian City-Dweller?

attributes.content: Additionally, we can presume he's already noticed someone is monitoring his tracks.
attributes.name: Kazimierzian City-Dweller?

attributes.content: After he stepped in to negotiate, Gale Industries released the Infected Zeno Shelvin of their own accord.
attributes.name: Kazimierzian City-Dweller?

attributes.content: I've already checked with them. They have the capacity to cope with the current pressure from public opinion. The next step is to shift the masses' attention to the illegally immigrated Infected in the city.
attributes.name: Kazimierzian City-Dweller?

attributes.content: It doesn't matter. Those affairs are theirs to handle as they wish. Our goal has always laid elsewhere.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: As for Nearl...
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: ...So now you're willing to step forward for the justice you believe in? Then why not then?
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone
